full_summary:
Typos corrected, and any minor sentence restructuring for comprehension
### Modification Project for Anse aux Basques Pilot Wharf

The Canadian Coast Guard is seeking a tender for structural modifications to the pilot wharf at Anse aux Basques. The objective of this project is to install a 15-foot tower at the end of the wharf, requiring the installation of H-beams to support the new structure.

This contract involves the construction of a concrete staircase and installation of a tower, necessitating the completion of all work by May 5th, 2023.
